scripts.db:status: docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U postgres -d wallet_db -c '\dt'
scripts.db:describe:users: docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U postgres -d wallet_db -c '\d users'
scripts.audit:logs: docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U postgres -d wallet_db -c 'SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10'
scripts.db:migrations: docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U postgres -d wallet_db -c 'SELECT * FROM schema_migrations ORDER BY applied_at'
scripts.docker:dev:restart: npm run build && docker-compose restart app
scripts.docker:prod:build: npm run build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml build
scripts.setup:dev: npm install && npm run build && npm run docker:dev && sleep 5 && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:dev:fresh: npm run docker:dev:clean && npm install && npm run build && npm run docker:dev && sleep 5 && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:prod: npm install && npm run build && npm run docker:prod && sleep 5 && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:prod:fresh: npm run docker:prod:clean && npm install && npm run build && npm run docker:prod && sleep 5 && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run build && npm run docker:up && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:fresh: npm run docker:clean && npm install && npm run build && docker-compose up -d --build && sleep 5 && npm run setup:db
